alexcrichton opened issue #12403:

Right now I think more-or-less all intrinsics check for may_leave, but reading over CanonicalABI.md there are some that do not check this:

  • resource.rep
  • context.get
  • context.set
  • backpressure.*
  • thread.index
  • thread.available-parallelism
